nodes.text: Purple Werm was an establishment located in a seedy part of the Coruscant Underworld. The building was situated right between Playland Theatre and Ihouse. The facade showed a large, purple Aurebesh neon sign, which spelled out the name of the establishment, and had a picture of a female face on top.
During the Clone Wars, bounty hunter Cad Bane stayed in an apartment right across the street from Purple Werm, while planning a mission to break into the Jedi Temple.
During pre-production, this establishment was called "Felucian Loveshack".
In the Trivia Gallery of "Holocron Heist" at StarWars.com, Purple Werm was mispelled "Purple Wer".
